Structs/Document/ResourceObject.html#/s:.name: relationships
Structs/Document/ResourceObject.html#/s:.abstract: Relationships between the resource and other resources

Structs/Document/ResourceObject.html#/s:.name: meta
Structs/Document/ResourceObject.html#/s:.abstract: Non-standard meta-information about the resource that can not be represented as an attribute or relationship

Structs/Document/RelationshipObject/Reso.name: ResourceLinkage
Structs/Document/RelationshipObject/Reso.abstract: Allows a client to link together all of the included resource objects

Structs/Document/RelationshipObject.html.name: links
Structs/Document/RelationshipObject.html.abstract: A links object containing the following members:

Structs/Document/RelationshipObject.html.name: data
Structs/Document/RelationshipObject.html.abstract: Allows a client to link together all of the included resource objects

Structs/Document/LinksObject/Link.html.name: Link
Structs/Document/LinksObject/Link.html.abstract: Represent the different forms of a link

Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.name: _self
Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: The link that generated the current response document

Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.name: about
Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: A link that leads to further details about this particular occurrence of the problem

Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.name: related
Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: Provides access to resource objects linked in a relationship

Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.name: first
Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: The first page of data for pagination

Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.name: prev
Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: The previous page of data for pagination

Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.name: next
Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: The next page of data for pagination

Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.name: last
Structs/Document/LinksObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: The last page of data for pagination

Structs/Document/JsonApiObject.html#/s:7.name: version
Structs/Document/JsonApiObject.html#/s:7.abstract: Indicate the highest JSON API version supported

Structs/Document/ErrorObject/Source.html.name: pointer
Structs/Document/ErrorObject/Source.html.abstract: A JSON Pointer RFC6901 to the associated entity in the request document

Structs/Document/ErrorObject/Source.html.name: parameter
Structs/Document/ErrorObject/Source.html.abstract: Indicate which URI query parameter caused the error

Structs/Document/ErrorObject/Source.html.name: Source
Structs/Document/ErrorObject/Source.html.abstract: An object containing references to the source of the error

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.name: id
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: A unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.name: links
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: A links object containing the following members:

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.name: status
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: The HTTP status code applicable to this problem

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.name: title
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: A short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.name: detail
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. Like title, this field’s value can be localized

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.name: source
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/s:7Js.abstract: An object containing references to the source of the error

Structs/Document/PrimaryData.html.name: PrimaryData
Structs/Document/PrimaryData.html.abstract: Represent the forms that the document primary data can take

Structs/Document.html#/s:7JsonAPI8Docume.name: included
Structs/Document.html#/s:7JsonAPI8Docume.abstract: Resource object that are related to the primary data and/or each other

Structs/Document/DocumentError.html.name: DocumentError
Structs/Document/DocumentError.html.abstract: Different errors that can be throwed when manipulating Document and the sub-objects

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html.name: ErrorObject
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html.abstract: Provide additional information about problems encountered while performing an operation
